trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies settings for an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> for hosting workflow-based Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，该配置元素为 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 的实例指定用于承载基于工作流的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务的设置。

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable one of the `ServiceDebugElement` features using a configuration file, you must:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用配置文件启用或禁用其中一个 `ServiceDebugElement` 功能，必须：

trans-unit.source: Add a behavior configuration attribute to the service element of your [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: 将行为配置属性添加到 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务的服务元素中。

trans-unit.source: Endpoint behaviors are configured on `endpoint` elements; service behaviors are configured on `service` elements.
trans-unit.target: 终结点行为在 `endpoint` 元素上配置；服务行为在 `service` 元素上配置。

trans-unit.source: Create a `serviceBehaviors` section, and add a behavior element with the name that corresponds to the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 `serviceBehaviors` 节，然后添加一个行为元素，该行为元素的名称与步骤 1 中 `behaviorConfiguration` 属性值相对应。

trans-unit.source: Add a `serviceDebug` element to the behavior element from step 2, and enable or disable the various properties as needed.
trans-unit.target: 将 `serviceDebug` 元素添加到步骤 2 中的行为元素中，并根据需要启用或禁用各个属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this behavior element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此行为元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 行为的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the time that a cached instance will expire.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定缓存实例过期的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time that a cached instance will expire.
trans-unit.target: 时间已缓存的实例将过期。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of common parameters used by services.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务使用的公用参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="NameValueConfigurationCollection" /> that contains common parameters used by services.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="NameValueConfigurationCollection" />，其中包含由服务使用的公用参数。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This collection will typically include the database connection string that might be shared by durable services.
trans-unit.target: 此集合通常将包括可由持久性服务共享的数据库连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 根据此配置元素的设置创建自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: A custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于此配置元素的设置的自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether performance counters are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用性能计数器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if performance counters are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用性能计数器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Performance counters provide information on various workflow-related statistics, but they cause a performance penalty when the workflow runtime engine starts, and when workflow instances are running.
trans-unit.target: 性能计数器提供各种与工作流相关的统计信息，但在工作流运行时引擎启动和工作流实例运行时会造成性能下降。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工作流运行时引擎的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含工作流运行时引擎的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于设置 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 实例，该实例包含一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 对象集合，这些对象可以是此配置元素的属性或 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 实例，该实例包含一个 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 对象集合，这些对象可以是此配置元素的属性或 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement.ContextProtectionLevel%2A> property is also contained in this property collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性集合中还包含 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement.ContextProtectionLevel%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of services that will be added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 引擎的服务集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of services that will be added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> engine.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 引擎的服务的集合。

trans-unit.source: The services specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection> will be initialized by the workflow runtime engine and added to its services when the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> constructor is called.
trans-unit.target: 在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection> 中指定的服务将由工作流运行时引擎初始化，并在调用适当的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 构造函数时添加工作流运行时引擎服务中。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the services specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection> must follow certain rules about the signatures of their constructors.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection> 中指定的服务必须遵循关于其构造函数的签名的特定规则。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether validation will occur on creation of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在创建工作流实例时发生验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if validation will occur on creation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建时发生验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the workflow validation is executed every time <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则在每次调用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> 时，都会执行工作流验证。

trans-unit.source: If validation errors are found, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现验证错误，则引发 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException> 错误。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> creates a workflow instance and skips validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 `false`，则 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> 会创建工作流实例并跳过验证。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the host application must ensure that the workflow is properly configured, or the runtime error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，宿主应用程序必须确保已正确配置了工作流，否则会发生运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 `true`。
